verses.verse: לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> liv-nei- for the sons קֹ֭רַח <S%H7141><s%> Ko-rach of Korah מִזְמ֣וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor A Psalm שִׁ֑יר <S%H7892><s%> Shir; [or] Song יְ֝סוּדָת֗וֹ <S%H3248><s%> ye-su-da-To, His foundation בְּהַרְרֵי־ <S%H2042><s%> be-har-rei- mountains קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh. [is] in the holy

אֹהֵ֣ב <S%H157><s%> 'o-Hev loveth יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD שַׁעֲרֵ֣י <S%H8179><s%> sha-'a-Rei the gates צִיּ֑וֹן <S%H6726><s%> tzi-Yon; of Zion מִ֝כֹּ֗ל <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol, all מִשְׁכְּנ֥וֹת <S%H4908><s%> mish-ke-Not more than all the dwellings יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko. of Jacob

נִ֭כְבָּדוֹת <S%H3513><s%> Nich-ba-dot Glorious things מְדֻבָּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> me-dub-Bar are spoken בָּ֑ךְ Bach; עִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> 'ir of thee O city הָאֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him of God סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

אַזְכִּ֤יר׀ <S%H2142><s%> 'az-Kir I will make mention רַ֥הַב <S%H7294><s%> Ra-hav of Rahab וּבָבֶ֗ל <S%H894><s%> u-va-Vel, and Babylon לְֽיֹ֫דְעָ֥י <S%H3045><s%> le-Yo-de-'Ai to them that know הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold פְלֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H6429><s%> fe-Le-shet me behold Philistia וְצ֣וֹר <S%H6865><s%> ve-Tzor and Tyre עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with כּ֑וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> Kush; with Ethiopia זֶ֝֗ה <S%H2088><s%> Zeh, This יֻלַּד־ <S%H3205><s%> yul-lad- this [man] was born שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham. But

וּֽלֲצִיּ֨וֹן׀ <S%H6726><s%> u-la-tzi-Yon And of Zion יֵאָמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> ye-'a-Mar, it shall be said אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish This and that man וְ֭אִישׁ <S%H376><s%> Ve-'ish one יֻלַּד־ <S%H3205><s%> yul-lad- was born בָּ֑הּ Bah; וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu Himself יְכוֹנְנֶ֣הָ <S%H3559><s%> ye-chon-Ne-ha himself shall establish עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H5945><s%> el-Yon. in her and the highest

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD יִ֭סְפֹּר <S%H5608><s%> Yis-por shall count בִּכְת֣וֹב <S%H3789><s%> bich-Tov when he writeth up עַמִּ֑ים <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim; the people זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh This יֻלַּד־ <S%H3205><s%> yul-lad- [that] this [man] was born שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. there Selah

וְשָׁרִ֥ים <S%H7891><s%> ve-sha-Rim As well the singers כְּחֹלְלִ֑ים <S%H2490><s%> ke-cho-le-Lim; as the players כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> kal- All מַעְיָנַ֥י <S%H4599><s%> ma'-ya-Nai on instruments [shall be there] all my springs בָּֽךְ׃ Bach.
